__RETURN_PATH_TOOLTIP:
sprintf(__('Return Path indicates where non-delivery receipts—or bounce messages—%1$s are to be sent. If unchecked, bounce messages may be lost. With this enabled, %2$s you\'ll be emailed using "From Email" if any messages bounce due to issues with the recipient\'s email.', 'fluent-smtp'), '
', '
')
__TELEGRAM_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED: sprintf(__('Your FluentSMTP plugin is currently integrated with Telegram. Receive timely notifications from %s on Telegram for any email sending issues from your website. This ongoing connection ensures you\'re always informed about your email delivery status.', 'fluent-smtp'), '@fluentsmtp_bot')
__SUPPORT_INTRO: sprintf(__('Please view the %1$s first. If you still can\'t find the answer, %2$s and we will be happy to assist you with any problems.', 'fluent-smtp'), '' . __('documentation', 'fluent-smtp') . '', '' . __('open a GitHub issue', 'fluent-smtp') . '')
__TELE_INTRO: sprintf(__('Get real-time notifications on your %1$s for any email sending failures. Configure notifications with FluentSMTP\'s official %2$s to start receiving real-time alerts.', 'fluent-smtp'), 'Telegram Messenger', 'telegram bot')
__SLACK_TERMS: sprintf(__('I agree to the %1$s of this Slack integration.', 'fluent-smtp'), '' . __('terms and conditions', 'fluent-smtp') . '')
__GIT_CONTRIBUTE: sprintf(__('If you are a developer and would like to contribute to the project, please %s', 'fluent-smtp'), '' . __('contribute on GitHub', 'fluent-smtp') . '')
__TELE_LAST_STEP: sprintf(__('Please find %s on Telegram and send the following text to activate this connection.', 'fluent-smtp'), '@fluentsmtp_bot')
__TELE_TERMS: sprintf(__('I agree to the %s of this Telegram integration.', 'fluent-smtp'), '' . __('terms and conditions', 'fluent-smtp') . '')
__GCP_API_INST: sprintf(__('Please %s to create API keys on the Google Cloud Platform.', 'fluent-smtp'), '' . __('check the documentation', 'fluent-smtp') . '')
__GCP_INTRO: sprintf(__('Google API version has been upgraded. Please %s.', 'fluent-smtp'), '' . __('read the doc and upgrade your API connection', 'fluent-smtp') . '')
__MAILGUN_REGION: sprintf(__('If you are operating under EU laws, you may be required to use the EU region. %s.', 'fluent-smtp'), '' . __('More information on Mailgun.com', 'fluent-smtp') . '')
